name: Descent: Freespace: The Great War
overview: Descent: Freespace: The Great War is the highly acclaimed space-combat simulator from Volition/Interplay and offers an unparalleled mix of top-notch graphics, plot and gameplay. The mission objectives are nicely varied and include "search and destroy", espionage missions and some epic battles with capital ships near the end of the game. Technical Requirements: PPC processor or 68060 Graphics-card 3D accelerators supported through Warp3D Soundcards optionally supported through AHI 64 MB of RAM (min. 48 MB free) 8x CD ROM
